stepTitle: A bag of mixed nuts contains cashews, pistachios, and almonds. There are 1,000 total nuts in the bag, and there are $$100$$ less almonds than pistachios. The cashews weigh $$3$$ g, pistachios weigh $$4$$ g, and almonds weigh $$5$$ g. If the bag weighs $$3.7$$ kg, find out how many of each type of nut is in the bag.
